alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton and central Merrick Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Archer, or 22 miles northeast of Grand Island, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Central City around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central, central and east central Nebraska.
